description: WinMailPassRec is a password recovery tool for Windows 10 and Windows 11 that displays the details of all POP3/IMAP/SMTP/Exchange accounts stored in the mail application of Windows operating system. For every account, the following information is displayed: Account Name, Email, Mailbox Type, Mail Server, User, Password, Outgoing Server, Outgoing Server Password, Account Creation Time, Last Used Time, Last Sync Attempt Time, Last Sync Success Time.
shortcuts: NirSoft\WinMailPassRec - Windows Mail App Password Recovery
